title: Ep. 744 The Democrats Are Lying, Again
description:
Summary:
The Democrats are not telling you the truth about the latest illegal immigration reports. Also, I explain why former Obama administration officials are desperate to change the timeline on the Trump investigation. 
 
News Picks:
This piece debunks some common liberal myths about immigration. 
 
The truth about separating kids at the border.
 
The immorality of the radical, open-borders Left.
 
Why does the timeline in the FBI’s Trump team investigation keep changing?
 
Peter Strzok’s testimony could be explosive. 
 
Another approach to the Trump team by someone connected to the FBI? 
 
Liberals are defending gang members, again. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
